overview: The cowardly and fearful Shushan disciple Jiu Jian came to Baxie Valley to find Jianxin in order to save his master. Here he met Mo Lige, who awakened his strength in his heart, and a group of people who lived in Baxie Valley. With the help of everyone, the lovely people in the Evil Valley, Jiujian finally got rid of the distracting thoughts in his heart and grew up to be a brave swordsman who defeated the evil villain Yan Chongtian
title: Shushan of Ten Thousand Swords Sealing Demons
